text: Nuh guft: Ej qavmi man, ci megued, agar az sui Parvardigoram daleli ravsan dosta ʙosam, in ki man ʙarhaq hastam va U ʙa man rahmati xes (ja'ne, nuʙuvvat va risolat) arzoni karda ʙosad. Pas, haqiqati on, ʙa saʙaʙi nodoni va fireftasudanaton dar dunjo ʙar sumo pinhon monda ʙosad, ojo dar hole, ki xud namexohed, sumoro ʙa zuri ʙa daromadani islom macʙur sozem? Lekin sumoro ʙa Alloh mesuporem, to U hukm namojad dar amri sumo on ci ki meʙinad va mexohad
